trans-unit.source: Provides information about the status and data resulting from a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send*> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om status og data fra en <> </> *> eller <> </> *> operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class attempts to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request to a remote computer and receive information back from the computer via an ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>klassen prøver å sende en forespørsel om oppdatering av Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) til en ekstern datamaskin og motta informasjon fra datamaskinen via en ICMP Oppdater svarmelding.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class uses instances of the PingReply class to return information about the operation, such as its status and the time taken to send the request and receive the reply.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>klassen bruker forekomster av klassen PingReply returnerte ikke informasjon om operasjonen, for eksempel statusen og tiden som brukes til å sende forespørselen og mottar svaret.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> methods return instances of the PingReply class directly.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>metoder returnere forekomster av klassen PingReply direkte.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods return a PingReply in the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> method's <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>metoder returnere en PingReply i den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>for metoden <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs>parameteren.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The PingReply is accessed through the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: PingReply er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>er ikke <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, bør du ikke bruke verdiene som returneres av den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> property will return zero, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> property will return an empty array, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>egenskapen returnere null, i <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>egenskapen returnere en tom matrise og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>egenskapen returnere `null`.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the address of the host that sends the Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo reply.
trans-unit.target: Henter adressen til verten som sender Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) Oppdater svar.

trans-unit.source: The Address returned by any of the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> overloads can originate from a malicious remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Adressen ble returnert av noen av de <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>overlastingene kan kommer fra en ondsinnet ekstern datamaskin.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not connect to the remote computer using this address.
trans-unit.target: Ikke koble til den eksterne datamaskinen ved hjelp av denne adressen.

trans-unit.source: Use DNS to determine the IP address of the machine to which you want to connect.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DNS til å fastslå IP-adressen til datamaskinen du vil koble til.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> containing the destination for the ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>som inneholder målet for ICMP Oppdater meldingen.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: Gets the buffer of data received in an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Henter bufferen med data som er mottatt i en melding om Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) Oppdater svar.

trans-unit.source: The data buffer sent with the ICMP echo request is returned to the sender in the echo reply so the roundtrip travel time for a packet of a known size can be computed.
trans-unit.target: Databufferen som er sendt med ICMP Oppdater forespørselen returneres til avsenderen i svaret Oppdater slik tur-retur-reise lenge en pakke med en kjent størrelse kan beregnes.

trans-unit.source: The data buffer, combined with the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> option, can be used to discover the maximum transmission unit for the network path between the source and destination computers.
trans-unit.target: Databufferen, kombinert med den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>alternativet, kan brukes til å oppdage maksimalt overføringsenhet for nettverksbane mellom kilde- og serverdatamaskinene.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see "Traceroute" in RFC 1574, Section 3.2, available at http://www.ietf.org.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se "Traceroute" i RFC 1574, del 3.2, tilgjengelig på http://www.ietf.org.

trans-unit.source: The default buffer used with <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> contains 32 bytes of data.
trans-unit.target: Standard-buffer som brukes med <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>inneholder 32 byte med data.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array containing the data received in an ICMP echo reply message, or an empty array, if no reply was received.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Byte>matrise som inneholder data som er mottatt i en ICMP Oppdater svarmelding eller en tom matrise Hvis ingen svar ble mottatt.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Gets the options used to transmit the reply to an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request.
trans-unit.target: Henter alternativene som brukes til å overføre svar på en forespørsel for oppdatering av Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP).

trans-unit.source: The TTL defines the number of times nodes can forward a packet as it travels between its source and destination.
trans-unit.target: TTL definerer hvor mange ganger noder kan videresende en pakke som sendes mellom kilde- og målgatewayer.

trans-unit.source: If the number of forwards, also known as hops, exceeds the value specified for the TTL, the packet is deemed undeliverable and is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis antallet videresending, også kjent som Hopp, overskrider den angitte verdien for TTL, pakken anses som ikke leveres og forkastes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> value specified in the ICMP echo request controls packet fragmentation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>verdien angitt i ICMP Oppdater forespørselen Kontroller pakke fragmentert.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> is `true` and the packet size exceeds the maximum transmission unit of the network path taken by the packet, the packet is discarded and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> error is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>er `true` og pakkestørrelsen overskrider den maksimale overføring enheten nettverksbane som utføres av pakken, forkastes pakken og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>feilmelding.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions"></xref> object that contains the Time to Live (TTL) and the fragmentation directive used for transmitting the reply if <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status*> is <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions"> </xref> objektet som inneholder klokkeslettet Live (TTL) og direktivet fragmentert brukes for sending av svaret hvis <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status*>er <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of milliseconds taken to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request and receive the corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall millisekunder det tok å sende en forespørsel om Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)-oppdatering og meldingen tilsvarende ICMP Oppdater svar.

trans-unit.source: If the Echo request fails, the RoundtripTime time is reported as 0, which is also a valid value when the request succeeds.
trans-unit.target: Hvis forespørselen oppdatering mislykkes, rapporteres RoundtripTime tiden som 0, som er også en gyldig verdi når forespørselen er vellykket.

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> to determine whether the value returned by this property should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Du må merke den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>å finne ut om verdien som returneres av denne egenskapen skal ignoreres.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> that specifies the round trip time, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>som angir tur-retur-tiden i millisekunder.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the status of an attempt to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request and receive the corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Henter status for et forsøk på å sende en forespørsel om Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)-oppdatering og meldingen tilsvarende ICMP Oppdater svar.

trans-unit.source: If the value of Status is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for Status ikke <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, bør du ikke bruke verdiene som returneres av den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties will return zero, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Egenskaper vil returnere null, og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>egenskapen returnere `null`.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus"></xref> value indicating the result of the request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus"> </xref> verdi som angir resultatet av forespørselen.
